Title: Riki-Oh: The Story of Ricky
Writer: Tetsuya Saruwatari (manga "Riki-oh"), Masahiko Takajo (manga "Riki-oh"), Ngai Choi Lam (screenplay)
Actors: Siu-Wong Fan, Mei Sheng Fan, Ka-Kui Ho, Yukari Ôshima
Plot: The story is set in the year of 2001 in a prison owned by a major company. A new prisoner sees his friends being harassed and killed by the guards and seeks his revenge.
